verses.kjv: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, if someone is caught in a sin, those of you who are spiritually mature should gently help that person get back on track. But watch yourself carefully, so that you don't end up falling into temptation too.

verses.kjv: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
verses.ct: Carry each other's burdens, and in doing so you will fulfill the law of Christ.

verses.kjv: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
verses.ct: If anyone thinks they are important when they really aren't, they are only fooling themselves.

verses.kjv: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
verses.ct: Instead, each person should examine their own actions. Then they can take satisfaction in what they themselves have done, rather than comparing themselves to someone else.

verses.kjv: For every man shall bear his own burden.
verses.ct: After all, each person will have to carry their own load.

verses.kjv: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.
verses.ct: Anyone who receives instruction in God's word should share all good things with the person who teaches them.

verses.kjv: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
verses.ct: Don't be fooled — no one makes a mockery of God. Whatever a person plants, that is exactly what they will harvest.

verses.kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
verses.ct: Whoever plants seeds to satisfy their sinful nature will harvest decay and destruction from that nature. But whoever plants seeds to please the Spirit will harvest eternal life from the Spirit.

verses.kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
verses.ct: So let's not get tired of doing what is right, because at just the right time we will gather a harvest — as long as we don't give up.

verses.kjv: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
verses.ct: So whenever we have the chance, let's do good to everyone, and especially to those who belong to the family of faith.

verses.kjv: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.
verses.ct: Notice what large letters I'm using as I write this to you with my own hand!

verses.kjv: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
verses.ct: Those who want to look impressive outwardly are the ones pressuring you to get circumcised. They do this only to avoid being persecuted for the cross of Christ.

verses.kjv: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
verses.ct: Even those who are circumcised don't actually follow the law themselves. They just want you circumcised so they can brag about your submission to that ritual.

verses.kjv: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
verses.ct: But as for me, I will never brag about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ. Through that cross, the world has been put to death as far as I'm concerned, and I have been put to death as far as the world is concerned.

verses.kjv: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
verses.ct: Because when it comes to being united with Christ Jesus, neither circumcision nor the lack of it matters at all. What matters is being made into an entirely new creation.

verses.kjv: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
verses.ct: For all who live by this principle, may peace and mercy rest on them — and on the Israel of God.

verses.kjv: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
verses.ct: From now on, let no one cause me trouble, because I carry on my body the scars that mark me as belonging to the Lord Jesus.

verses.kjv: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, may the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
